column4: thx for all the tips so far,I have one more to ask - how can I check my HD for errors or bad sectors or whatever on ubuntu?
sorry for being such a moron, but what exactly do i have to type: badblocks -what?
man badblocks - you want non-destructive, probably; if it's a recent drive, you'd probably be better off to use smartctl to run the drive's onboard diagnostics
